input.sentences: went to go check out a crashed truck
it has a lot of damage the from passenger side
the front bumper is completely ruined
the hood of the car is destroyed
the driver side looks to have taken the worst hit
output.sentences: The drunk man crashed his red truck on a big tree.
The passenger side front has some damage.
The front has big dent, and the lights are gone.
The front hood is pushing backwards, bented too.
The driver side is the worse of all, lucky driver is still alive with minor injuries.
